lines.text: Arma gravi numero violentaque bella parabam
Par erat inferior versus: risisse Cupido

comments.text: When you see an infinitive in indirect speech but don't yet know what is introducing the infinitive, try just translating it as if it were an indicative verb until you know more.
comments.author: M. Jean

translations.text: So it's said, and snatched away one foot.
translations.author: M. Jean
